context_bundle.summary: Scaffolding tools: Yeoman (yo generator-*), Plop (team-specific templates), Create React App, Vite, Next.js CLI. Generate project structure, boilerplate code, config files. Use generators for consistency across projects. Custom generators for team patterns.

onboarding.quick_start: Scaffolding = project structure generators. Yeoman: npm install -g yo, yo generator-name (community generators). Plop: team-specific templates, plop component-name. Framework CLIs: create-react-app, npm create vite@latest, npx create-next-app. Use for: new projects, components, modules.
common_patterns: Create React App: npx create-react-app my-app
